block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$877,750 400 East 56th Street (Plaza 400) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, entry foyer, dining room, terrace, 3 exposures, East River view; maintenance $1,913, 54% tax-deductible; listed at $895,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Kathy Matson Real Estate)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$877,750 400 East 56th Street (Plaza 400) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, entry foyer, dining room, terrace, 3 exposures, East River view; maintenance $1,913, 54% tax-deductible; listed at $895,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Kathy Matson Real Estate)

$737,500 11 Fifth Avenue (Eighth Street) (Brevoort) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; concierge, dining area, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $1,211, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $800,000, 12 weeks on market (Brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Corcoran Group)

$570,000 295 Greenwich St. (Chambers St.) (Greenwich Court North) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,117-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, marble baths, c/a, washer/dryer in unit; common charges $713; taxes $6,756; listed at $595,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$660,000 345 East 80th Street (Eastwinds) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, renovated kitchen and baths, balcony, common roof deck; common charges $593; taxes $6,629; listed at $679,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Bette Bregman)

$700,000 600 West 111th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, high ceilings, h/w floors, needs work; maintenance $1,205, 35% tax-deductible; listed at $710,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Gala West)

$130,000 2727 Palisades Avenue (High Point) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, 2 exposures, Hudson River view; pool and health club in building; maintenance $551, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $130,000, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Susan E. Goldy; Sandra Silverman)

$216,500 155 Henry Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; renovated kitchen and bath, office, decorative moldings, washer/dryer, 2 exposures; maintenance $724, 59% tax-deductible; listed at $200,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

$350,000 438 12th Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. condo in a renovated prewar building; elevator, dining room, high ceilings, h/w floors; common charges $413; taxes $3,600; listed at $350,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Heights Berkeley)

$199,000 60 Plaza Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 900-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, entry foyer, raised dining area, high ceilings, h/w floors, 6 closets; maintenance $588, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $199,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

$249,000 53-24 206th Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 49-year-old semiattached vinyl-sided house; dining room, finished basement, 1-car garage, 27-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,790; listed at $249,800, 10 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$360,000 14-46 140th Street 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 44-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, h/w floors, carport, 80-by-68-ft. lot; taxes $2,514; listed at $379,000, 1 week on market (Brokers: ReMax/ Universal; Pat Stavile Realty)

$300,000 223 Amber Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 38-year-old ranch; dining area, eat-in kitchen, new windows, whirlpool bath, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,836; listed at $317,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)

$26,500 350 Richmond Terrace 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 673-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; renovated kitchen, dining area, parquet floors, 6 closets; maintenance $440, 36% tax-deductible; listed at $26,000 (multiple bids), 21 weeks on market (Broker: Gateway Arms Realty)

$510,000 18 Hillside Avenue 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 60-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, deck, basement, 2-car garage 75-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $6,200; listed at $525,000, 15 weeks on market (Brokers: Trylon; Lurie)

$185,000 16 Richmond Place 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 29-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, basement, 1-car garage, 0.25-acre lot; taxes $6,700; listed at $185,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Anastasio)

$340,000 356 Mineola Boulevard 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 55-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, basement, fireplace, 1-car attached garage, deck, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $4,900; listed at $369,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Atanas)

$270,000 62 Middle Neck Road 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 51-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, basement, 2-car garage, 55-by-130-ft. lot; taxes $5,200; listed at $289,000, 24 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker Sammis; Sandsport)

$260,000 5 Morey Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 11-year-old contemporary; dining room, eat-in kitchen with pantry, family room, finished basement, 2-car garage, 1.24-acre lot; taxes $3,524; listed at $272,500, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$950,000 47 Shore Road 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 75-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen with island, den, .44-acre lot; 2-bedroom cottage near beach, 2-car garage; taxes $5,178; listed at $995,000, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: Greenwich Custom Real Estate; Coldwell Banker/Old Greenwich)

$347,500 5650 Main Street 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 3-year-old vinyl-sided colonial; eat-in kitchen with pantry, whirlpool bath off master suite, gas fireplace, rear deck, 2-car garage, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $4,673; listed at $347,500, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; William Raveis)

$865,000 15 Overlook Drive 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 2-year-old colonial; library, master bedroom suite, cathedral ceiling, fireplace, cul-de-sac, 3-car garage; 4-acre lot; taxes $17,486; listed at $879,000, 9 weeks on market (Brokers: Holmes & Kennedy; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$105,000 1189 California Road 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 29-year-old co-op; beach rights, parking space; maintenance $549, 40% tax deductible; listed at $110,000, 21 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; A. T. White Realty)

$539,500 206 Barnegat Road 5-bedroom, 4-bath, 49-year-old ranch; eat-in kitchen, fireplace, hardwood floors, dining room, recreation room, 2-car garage; 2.4-acre lot; taxes $7,155; listed at $539,500, 4 days on market (Broker: Houlihan/ Lawrence)

$160,000 277 Prospect Avenue 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 30-year-old renovated condo; c/a, dining room, terrace; common charges $464; taxes $4,300; listed at $165,000, 2 1/2 weeks on market (Brokers: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens; Pleasant Realtors)

$150,000 10 Ravenwood Court 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 11-year-old contemporary colonial; patio, family room with fireplace, 1-car garage, .14-acre lot; taxes $7,133; listed at $155,990, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert)

$205,000 201-03 23rd Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 25-year-old two-family house; 2-bedroom, 1-bath owner apartment above 2-bedroom, 1-bath rental unit; eat-in kitchens, second-floor deck, 57-by-100-ft. corner lot; taxes $2,995; listed at $209,000, 5 months on market (Broker: Richards Agency)
